title: NYC Bail Fund Management Audit 2018 (Office of the Comptroller of New York City)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All reports, summaries, and letters from the January 1–June 30, 2018 audit of the New York City Department of Finance's bail fund management.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

New York Focus

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

The Bail Forfeiture Lists for calendar years 2022 and 2023 — containing fields with information including but not limited to names, docket numbers, and bail amounts — in .xls, .xlsx, or .csv format.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

New York Focus

title: NYC Bail Refunds by County and Court

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Documentation detailing total Bail Refunds by County and Court for calendar years 2014 through 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

1) All email communications (including email attachments, and complete email chains) between Secretary of State Frank LaRose (or anyone communicating on his behalf, including office staff) and Hans von Spakovsky (hans.vonspakovsky@heritage.org) sent or received between January 1, 2024 and the date this request is processed.

2) Any email communications, including full email chains and attachments, sent or received by Secretary of State Frank LaRose (or anyone communicating on his behalf, including office staff) between January 1, 2024 and the date this request is processed with the following keywords: "Hans von Spakovsky," "von Spakovsky," and/or "Spakovsky."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Alice Herman

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: FL SOS von Spakovsky communications
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

communications.subject: The Missouri Sunshine Law Request: MO SOS von Spakovsky communications
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the The Missouri Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

1)  All email communications (including email attachments, and complete email chains) between Secretary of State Jay Ashcroft (or anyone communicating on his behalf, including office staff) and Hans von Spakovsky (hans.vonspakovsky@heritage.org) sent or received between January 1, 2024 and the date this request is processed. 

2) Any email communications, including full email chains and attachments, sent or received by Secretary of State Jay Ashcroft (or anyone communicating on his behalf, including office staff) between January 1, 2024 and the date this request is processed with the following keywords: "Hans von Spakovsky," "von Spakovsky," and/or "Spakovsky."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alice Herman

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: GA SOS von Spakovsky communications
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1) All email communications (including all email attachments and including complete email chains) between Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger (or anyone communicating on his behalf, including office staff) and Hans von Spakovsky (hans.vonspakovsky@heritage.org) sent or received between January 1, 2024 and the date this request is processed. 

2) Any email communication (including all email attachments and including complete email chains) sent by Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger (or anyone communicating on his behalf, including office staff) including the following keywords: "Hans von Spakovsky," "von Spakovsky," and/or "Spakovsky."

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alice Herman
